title: Alcohol Companion: common sense supplement
description: Whether we are drinkers, abstainers or “dry-curious” we all have unanswered questions about alcohol. This unique book equips alcohol consumers with cutting-edge insight.Alcohol is deeply familiar yet its effects are too complex for common sense explanation. This amiable companion provides answers centred on new scientific findings and systematic thought.In providing its unique insight the book will take you on a journey through history, medicine, belief, neuroscience, psychology, genetics, happiness, sociology and philosophy.We cannot hope to understand everything about alcohol, but we can use what is known to feel better, improve our lives and better understand others.Phil Cain’s work is featured by The Economist, Telegraph, Financial Times, Wall Street Journal, Observer, Al Jazeera, CBS and BBC. ■To keep posted on developments related to this book and his ongoing work, please register for updates from his site philcain.com.
author: Phil Cain
